r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block
1 DRYC_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, did you do any of the following activities at work?
DRYC_1A Dry cleaning of clothes on site (1)
DRYC_1B Organisation of dry cleaning off site (2)
If 1 = DRYC_1A Dry cleaning of clothes on site
1A1 DRYC_CHECK_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following dry cleaning chemicals?
DRYC_1A1C Solvent-based cleaners (e.g Petroleum distillates, hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (3)
If 1 = DRYC_1A Dry cleaning of clothes on site
1A2 DRYC_CHECK_1A2 - In the last working week, did you do any of the following tasks?
DRYC_1A2C Transferred dry cleaned clothing from the washer to the dryer (3)
DRYC_1A2D Manually transferred dry cleaning chemicals from a storage tank to a washer (4)
DRYC_1A2F Maintained or repaired dry cleaning equipment (6)
If 1 = DRYC_1A Dry cleaning of clothes on site
1A3 DRYC_CHECK_1A3 - How was the area where you carried out dry cleaning of clothes ventilated?
DRYC_1A3A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
DRYC_1A3B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
DRYC_1A3C By a general ventilation system (3)
DRYC_1A3D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
DRYC_1A3E By open doors or windows (5)
DRYC_1A3F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
If 1 = DRYC_1A Dry cleaning of clothes on site
1A4 DRYC_RADIO_1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A4A1 DRYC_CHECK_1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
DRYC_1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
DRYC_1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
DRYC_1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you clean fabrics such as carpets, clothes or textiles?
CHECK_2_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following chemicals to clean stains from fabrics?
aFAB_1A1B Solvent- based cleaners (e.g. Petroleum distillates / hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (2)
- How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFAB_1A2A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFAB_1A2B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFAB_1A2C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFAB_1A2D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFAB_1A2E By open doors or windows (5)
aFAB_1A2F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
RADIO_3_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
CHECK_3_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?
aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
RADIO_3_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?
RADIO_3_1A3 - In the last working week, did you drive or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
CHECK_3_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?
aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area (1)
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways) (2)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry (6)
RADIO_3_1A4 - In the last working week, did you perform any maintenance work on vehicles?
RADIO_3_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
RADIO_3_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?
RADIO_3_1A4A2 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches?
RADIO_3_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]?
RADIO_3_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
CHECK_3_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
CHECK_3_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?
aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
CHECK_4_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?
aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner (2)
